title: Bloomberg Markets: Levy Says Fed Gently Working back to Normal
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Levy Says Fed Gently Working back to Normal
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: David Levy Chairman Jerome Levy Forecasting Center Discussing the most Federal Reserve officials judging “it would soon be appropriate” to tighten monetary policy again and backed a plan that would gradually shrink their $4.5 trillion balance sheet.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
